channel.title: Poll.... Do you Think That on here you should
channel.description:
Hi :cool:
Do you Think That on here mopar should put Arcade on the forum with highscores??? like this one http://www.progamer.freeforums.org/arcade.php?sid=22d56a195fe665ec9807a39bcea1f636 Yes/No
If you chose Yes Say why... If you chose No Say why.. (IN THE COMMENTS)
Thank You Slow Pk

item.title: Poll.... Do you Think That on here you should
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

Refer to this thread if you wish to suggest ideas, although I honestly doubt there will be an arcade added.

Read full topic

item.title: Poll.... Do you Think That on here you should
item.dc:creator: @ollie123 Ollie123
item.description:
@ollie123 wrote:

http://www.moparisthebest.com/hamachi.php

There already is.

[quote=“Hamachi Status Page”]Hosting a server using hamachi is less than desirable. There is no way to check if they are online.
They are less stable, have more lag, and are a potential security risk to your entire computer.
If you decide to join a hamachi server make sure you have a good firewall enabled and do not
accept any files from anyone you do not trust with access to your computer.[/quote]

^ This.

Read full topic
item.source: Poll.... Do you Think That on here you should
